It is a slow and timid creature, but as something divine it is sure to be under celestial protection. ---- "In ancient tales, O friend, thy spirit dwelt;
There, from of old, thy childhood passed; and there
High expectation, high delights and deeds,
Thy fluttering heart with hope and terror moved." -Robert Louis Stevenson, "Et Tu In Arcadia Vixisti", _Underwoods_. 1887.}} ==Useful Info== '''Spirits''' were supposed to be insubstantial, seemingly harmless [[holy]] creatures which did nothing but avoid you, using [[Blink]] to escape in spite of their miserably low speed. After roughly 200 turns of existence, however, they immediately turned into random other holy monsters. They were also protected by [[the Shining One]]; killing a spirit might result in him smiting you for light damage. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=[[Blink Away]] |slot2=[[Blink Away]] |slot3=[[Blink Away]] |slot4=[[Blink Away]] |slot5=[[Blink Away]] |slot6=[[Blink Away]] }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== Killing them as spirits guaranteed your safety, but you get more XP from killing pretty much any other holy monster. ==History== Spirits were designed and considered for use in ''Crawl'', but were never included in any official release.
